Row.Text: Rorona
Pie Master Ending

Building a Commercial Hub adjacent to [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] Cattle, [ICON_RESOURCE_CITRUS] Citrus, [ICON_RESOURCE_SUGAR] Sugar, or [ICON_RESOURCE_WHEAT] Wheat will consume the resource and grant a sum of [ICON_Gold] Gold. For every four resources consumed in this way, receive a copy of the unique [ICON_RESOURCE_SAILOR_PIES] Pie luxury resource, which will automatically establish an [ICON_RESIDENT_EMBASSY] Embassy when traded to another civilization.

Rorolina Frixell, yours is the cauldron that bakes. Be they brimful with berries or animated as cursed facsimiles of life, your pies command the world stage. Use them to unite it under your rule, for the quickest way into a person's heart is through their stomach. If that fails... well, there's always Piemeteor.
Rorona
Rorolina Frixell
Is this...? A pie recipe! So I really can make pies with alchemy!

Though a bit of a lay about, this young girl is energetic and bright and loves alchemy. On behalf of her mentor, the owner of the Atelier, she undertakes to fulfill the requests of the country. Her nickname is Rorona and she loves to bake pies.
Welcome to Rorona's Pie Shop! I'm Rorolina Frixell.
Won't you visit the nearest branch of my pie-and-workshop franchise?
Off we go.
Have you ever seen a city clustered around the mysterious ruins of an ancient civilization? That's Arland! What sets your capital apart?
Welcome!
We'll reserve a table just for your delegation. With pie. Everyone likes pie.
Our tables are all reserved for the time being. Try again later.
Living Pie, Dragon Pie, Ruby Pie, Meat Pie, Cabbage Pie, Cream Pie, Mushroom Pie, Seafood Pie, Honey Pie, Berry Pie, Dark Pie, Golden Pie, Plain Pie, Tea Pie, Ice Pie... I sent pies.
Go with caution. Avoid all dragons. Unless you want your pies filled with the sweet embrace of death.
Nope. I'm afraid the ferocious monsters of Orthogalaxen would be too much for you.
Who but I could make pies this tasty? And who could possibly resist opening their borders to my pies?
Hehehe...
Uh, well... Your face is way too scary for that.
If life is a pie, it's up to us to stuff it with lots of friendship filling. Will you give me your friendship filling?
Hehehe...
Aww.
If we work together, that's twice the twirl-twirling, twice the synthesizing, twice the fun.
Wow. Is the line for my pie shop really this long? I'm so haâ€”wait. You're only here for the line, right?
Thank you for your patronage.
No, thanks.
Aww... But I'm friendly... Aren't I friendly?
Ugh. You're more trouble than Master when she hasn't had her nap, or when she's trying to get me into a new swimsuit, or... You're more trouble than Master. (Denounces You.)
Hmhmhm. I can tell you like your pies filled with the sweet embrace of death.
Hmhmhm. I synthesized a Piemeteor juuust for you. Master says it's best to take no prisoners.
Whew. What a relief.
Master said to finish what I start.
Wouldn't you rather relax a little? Have a slice of pie?
I was so preoccupied with whether or not I could that I never stopped to think if I should. Aww...
You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could that you never stopped to think if you should.
Entrepieneurial Spirit
Rorona will endeavor to generate gold, and gets on well with like-minded leaders. She likes those who have a copy of her unique Pie resource.
